summary:
Elsa is a popular Disney princess from the movie *Frozen*. Based on a character from a Hans Christian Andersen story, she has magical ice powers. Elsa struggles to control her abilities and is afraid of hurting others, especially her sister, Anna.

The filmmakers changed the original story, making Elsa and Anna sisters. This helped make Elsa a more relatable and sympathetic character. Voice actress Idina Menzel's powerful performance, especially in the song "Let It Go," also made Elsa very popular.
title: Elsa (Frozen)
